did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: First Methodist Episcopal Church of Konana records, 1861-1892.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: First Methodist Episcopal Church of Konana (Konana, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One volume of a preprinted register containing lists of baptisms, marriages, probationers, members and classes.

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: Very little is known about this congregation except that they purchased a church, formerly owned by the Christian and Universalists, at a sheriff's sale and were later given the Presbyterian church after that congregation became defunct.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a one volume pre-printed register containing lists of baptisms, marriages, probationers, members and classes.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: First Methodist Episcopal Church of Konana (Konana, N.Y.)

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: First Methodist Episcopal Church of Konana records, #6089. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: East Genesee Conference Methodist Episcopal Church commencing A.D. 1861, 1861-1892
Lists date, name of person baptised, date of birth, residence, officiating minister and witnesses.
Lists date, name of parties, their residences, place of marriage, officiating minister, and witnesses.
Lists date, name, condition (married, single, widowed), residence, class leader and remarks.
Name, residence, time and mode of joining, class leader and remarks (death or other form of removal often indicated.)
Members, leader, where class meets and remarks for 1-4 classes. (Often indicates form of removal. Revised periodically.)
